message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at that price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is my bottom line. I know the value this product offers, and I'm confident it will be worth the investment for you.
